00048 typedef __PACKED_H struct
00049 {
00050   u8 modifier;
00051   u8 reserved;
00052   u8 keycode[6];
00053 } __PACKED_F KeyboardReport_TypeDef;
00054 
00055 typedef __PACKED_H struct _JOYSTICKREPORT_TYPEBIT
00056 {
00057   unsigned B1  :1;
00058   unsigned B2  :1;
00059   unsigned B3  :1;
00060   unsigned B4  :1;
00061   unsigned B5  :1;
00062   unsigned B6  :1;
00063   unsigned B7  :1;
00064   unsigned B8  :1;
00065 } __PACKED_F JoystickReport_TypeBit;
00066 
00067 typedef __PACKED_H union _JOYSTICKREPORT_TYPEDEF
00068 {
00069   u8 uByte;
00070   JoystickReport_TypeBit Button;
00071 } __PACKED_F JoystickReport_TypeDef;

00080 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00081 #define CLASS_DESC_OFFSET0                  (DESC_LEN_CONFN + DESC_LEN_INF)
00082 #define CLASS_DESC_OFFSET1                  (CLASS_DESC_OFFSET0 + DESC_LEN_HID + DESC_LEN_EPT + DESC_LEN_INF)
00083 
00084 #define CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT               (u16)(0x1 << 8)
00085 #define CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE               (u16)(0x2 << 8)
00086 #define CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO               (u16)(0x3 << 8)
00087 #define CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT               (u16)(0x9 << 8)
00088 #define CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE               (u16)(0xA << 8)
00089 #define CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO               (u16)(0xB << 8)
00090 
00091 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT              (0x01)
00092 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT             (0x02)
00093 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE            (0x03)
00094 
00095 #define HID_LED_1_MASK      (0x1)
00096 #define HID_LED_2_MASK      (0x2)
00097 #define HID_LED_3_MASK      (0x4)
00098 #define HID_LED_1_BIT       (0)
00099 #define HID_LED_2_BIT       (1)
00100 #define HID_LED_3_BIT       (2)
00101 
00102 #define HID_JOYSTICK_REPORT_SIZE (0x1)
00103 #define HID_KEYBOARD_REPORT_SIZE (0x8)

00137 /* USB HID Report Descriptor                                                                                */
00138 __ALIGN4 static uc8 USB_HID_ReportDesc0[] = {
00139     0x05, 0x01,                    // USAGE_PAGE (Generic Desktop)
00140     0x09, 0x06,                    // USAGE (Keyboard)
00141     0xa1, 0x01,                    // COLLECTION (Application)
00142 
00143     0x05, 0x07,                    //   USAGE_PAGE (Keyboard)
00144     0x19, 0xe0,                    //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Keyboard LeftControl)
00145     0x29, 0xe7,                    //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Keyboard Right GUI)
00146     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00147     0x25, 0x01,                    //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (1)
00148     0x75, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (1)
00149     0x95, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (8)
00150     0x81, 0x02,                    //   INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00151 
00152     0x95, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (1)
00153     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00154     0x81, 0x03,                    //   INPUT (Cnst, Var, Abs)
00155 
00156     0x95, 0x03,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (3)
00157     0x75, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (1)
00158     0x05, 0x08,                    //   USAGE_PAGE (LEDs)
00159     0x19, 0x01,                    //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Num Lock)
00160     0x29, 0x03,                    //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Kana)
00161     0x91, 0x02,                    //   OUTPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00162 
00163     0x95, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (1)
00164     0x75, 0x05,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (5)
00165     0x91, 0x03,                    //   OUTPUT (Cnst, Var, Abs)
00166 
00167     0x95, 0x06,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (6)
00168     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00169     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00170     0x25, 0x65,                    //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (101)
00171     0x05, 0x07,                    //   USAGE_PAGE (Keyboard)
00172     0x19, 0x00,                    //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Reserved (no event indicated))
00173     0x29, 0x65,                    //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Keyboard Application)
00174     0x81, 0x00,                    //   INPUT (Data, Ary, Abs)
00175 
00176     0xc0                           // END_COLLECTION
00177 };
00178 
00179 __ALIGN4 static uc8 USB_HID_ReportDesc1[] = {
00180     0x05, 0x01,                   // USAGE_PAGE (Generic Desktop)
00181     0x15, 0x00,                   // LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00182     0x09, 0x04,                   // USAGE (Joystick)
00183     0xa1, 0x01,                   // COLLECTION (Application)
00184     0x05, 0x09,                   //   USAGE_PAGE (Button)
00185     0x19, 0x01,                   //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Button 1)
00186     0x29, 0x08,                   //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Button 8)
00187     0x15, 0x00,                   //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00188     0x25, 0x01,                   //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (1)
00189     0x75, 0x01,                   //   REPORT_SIZE (1)
00190     0x95, 0x08,                   //   REPORT_COUNT (8)
00191     0x55, 0x00,                   //   UNIT_EXPONENT (0)
00192     0x65, 0x00,                   //   UNIT (None)
00193     0x81, 0x02,                   //   INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00194     0xc0                          // END_COLLECTION
00195 };

00199 
00200 static vu32 gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00201 static vu32 gIsSetOutputReport1 = FALSE;
00202 
00203 static vu32 gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00204 static vu32 gIsEP3INEmpty = TRUE;

00206 __ALIGN4 static KeyboardReport_TypeDef gKeyboardReport;
00207 __ALIGN4 static JoystickReport_TypeDef gJoystickReport;
00208 static u32 gIsKeySent = FALSE;

00210 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00211 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00212   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00213   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00214   * @retval None
00215   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00216 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00217 {
00218   s32 i;
00219   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00220   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00221 
00222   pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00223   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00224 
00225   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00226   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00227 
00228   pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00229   //pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00230   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00231 
00232   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00233   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00234   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00235   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00236   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00237   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00238   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00239   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00240 
00241   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00242   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00243   #endif
00244 
00245   gKeyboardReport.modifier = 0;
00246   for (i = 5; i >=0; i--)
00247   {
00248     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i] = 0;
00249   }
00250 
00251   gJoystickReport.uByte = 0;
00252 
00253   return;
00254 }
00255 
00256 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00257 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00258   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00259   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00260   * @retval None
00261   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00262 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00263 {
00264   USBDClass_ReportProcess0();
00265   //USBDClass_ReportProcess1();
00266 
00267   USBDClass_KeyProcess();
00268 
00269   return;
00270 }
00271 
00272 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00273   * @brief  USB Class Report Process for application.
00274   * @retval None
00275   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00276 static void USBDClass_ReportProcess0(void)
00277 {
00278   if (gIsSetOutputReport == TRUE)
00279   {
00280     gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00281     (gOutputReportBuffer & HID_LED_1_MASK) ? HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1) : HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00282     (gOutputReportBuffer & HID_LED_2_MASK) ? HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2) : HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00283     (gOutputReportBuffer & HID_LED_3_MASK) ? HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3) : HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED3);
00284   }
00285 
00286   return;
00287 }
00288

00290   * @brief  USB Class Report Process for application.
00291   * @retval None
00292   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00293 #if 0
00294 static void USBDClass_ReportProcess1(void)
00295 {
00296   if (gIsSetOutputReport1 == TRUE)
00297   {
00298     gIsSetOutputReport1 = FALSE;
00299   }
00300 
00301   return;
00302 }
00303 #endif
00304 
00305 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00306   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 1 IN Process for application.
00307   * @retval None
00308   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00309 static void USBDClass_KeyProcess(void)
00310 {
00311   s32 i = 0;
00312 
00313   for (i = 5; i >=0; i--)
00314   {
00315     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i] = 0;
00316   }
00317 
00318   i = 0;
00319   if (gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_NUMLOCK])
00320   {
00321     gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_NUMLOCK] = 0;
00322     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i++] = 0x53;
00323     gJoystickReport.Button.B1 = !gJoystickReport.Button.B1;
00324   }
00325 
00326   if (gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_CAPSLOCK])
00327   {
00328     gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_CAPSLOCK] = 0;
00329     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i++] = 0x39;
00330     gJoystickReport.Button.B2 = !gJoystickReport.Button.B2;
00331   }
00332 
00333   if (gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_SCROLLLOCK])
00334   {
00335     gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_SCROLLLOCK] = 0;
00336     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i++] = 0x47;
00337     gJoystickReport.Button.B3 = !gJoystickReport.Button.B3;
00338   }
00339 
00340   if (i != 0 && gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00341   {
00342     gIsEP1INEmpty = FALSE;
00343     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)&gKeyboardReport, HID_KEYBOARD_REPORT_SIZE);
00344     gIsKeySent = TRUE;
00345   }
00346   else if (i == 0 && gIsKeySent == TRUE && gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00347   {
00348     gIsEP1INEmpty = FALSE;
00349     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)&gKeyboardReport, HID_KEYBOARD_REPORT_SIZE);
00350     gIsKeySent = FALSE;
00351   }
00352 
00353   if (i != 0 && gIsEP3INEmpty == TRUE)
00354   {
00355     gIsEP3INEmpty = FALSE;
00356     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT3, (u32 *)&gJoystickReport, HID_JOYSTICK_REPORT_SIZE);
00357   }
00358 
00359   return;
00360 }
00361 
00362 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00363   * @brief  USB Class Reset.
00364   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Reset.
00365   * @retval None
00366   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00367 static void USBDClass_Reset(u32 uPara)
00368 {
00369   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00370   gIsEP3INEmpty = TRUE;
00371   gIsKeySent = FALSE;
00372 }

00388 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00389   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00390   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00391   * @retval None
00392   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00393 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00394 {
00395   u16 uUSBCmd = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request)));
00396 
00397 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00398   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00399 #endif
00400 
00401   switch (uUSBCmd)
00402   {
00403     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00404     /* | bRequest             | Data transfer direction | Type                | Recipient   | Data          */
00405     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00406 
00407     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00408     /* | 01_Get Report        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 01A1h         */
00409     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00410     case (CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00411     {
00412       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00413       USBDClass_GetReport(pDev);
00414       break;
00415     }
00416     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00417     /* | 02_Get Idle          | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 02A1h         */
00418     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00419     case (CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00420     {
00421       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00422       USBDClass_GetIdle(pDev);
00423       break;
00424     }
00425     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00426     /* | 03_Get Protocol      | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 03A1h         */
00427     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00428     case (CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00429     {
00430       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00431       USBDClass_GetProtocol(pDev);
00432       break;
00433     }
00434     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00435     /* | 09_Set Report        | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0921h         */
00436     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00437     case (CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00438     {
00439       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00440       USBDClass_SetReport(pDev);
00441       break;
00442     }
00443     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00444     /* | 0A_Set Idle          | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0A21h         */
00445     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00446     case (CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00447     {
00448       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00449       USBDClass_SetIdle(pDev);
00450       break;
00451     }
00452     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00453     /* | 0B_Set Protocol      | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0B21h         */
00454     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00455     case (CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00456     {
00457       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00458       USBDClass_SetProtocol(pDev);
00459       break;
00460     }
00461   }
00462 
00463   return;
00464 }
00465 
00466 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00467   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - GET_DESCRIPTOR
00468   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00469   * @retval None
00470   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00471 static void USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00472 {
00473   u32 type  = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00474   u32 index = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00475 
00476   switch (type)
00477   {
00478     case DESC_TYPE_21_HID:
00479     {
00480       if (index == 0)
00481       {
00482         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)((pDev->Desc.pConfnDesc) + CLASS_DESC_OFFSET0);
00483       }
00484       else if (index == 1)
00485       {
00486         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)((pDev->Desc.pConfnDesc) + CLASS_DESC_OFFSET1);
00487       }
00488       else
00489       {
00490         break;
00491       }
00492       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_HID;
00493       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00494       break;
00495     }
00496     case DESC_TYPE_22_RPOT:
00497     {
00498       if (index == 0)
00499       {
00500         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(USB_HID_ReportDesc0);
00501         pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_RPOT0;
00502       }
00503       else if (index == 1)
00504       {
00505         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(USB_HID_ReportDesc1);
00506         pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_RPOT1;
00507       }
00508       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00509       break;
00510     }
00511     case DESC_TYPE_23_PHY:
00512     {
00513       break;
00514     }
00515   } /* switch (type)                                                                                        */
00516 
00517   return;
00518 }

00538 /*

00540 {

00542 }
00543 */
00544 #endif
00545 
00546 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00547   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_REPORT
00548   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00549   * @retval None
00550   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00551 static void USBDClass_GetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00552 {
00553   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00554   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00555   u32 inf = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00556 
00557   switch (value)
00558   {
00559     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT:
00560     {
00561       if (inf == 0)
00562       {
00563         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gKeyboardReport);
00564       }
00565       else if (inf == 1)
00566       {
00567         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gJoystickReport);
00568       }
00569       else
00570       {
00571         break;
00572       }
00573       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00574       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00575       break;
00576     }
00577     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00578     {
00579       break;
00580     }
00581   }
00582 
00583   return;
00584 }
00585 
00586 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00587   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_IDLE
00588   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00589   * @retval None
00590   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00591 static void USBDClass_GetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00592 {
00593   /* Add your own GET_IDLE function here....
00594      For example....
00595 
00596   u32 uReportID  = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00597   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00598 
00599   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(__IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID]);
00600   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00601   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00602 
00603   */
00604   return;
00605 }
00606

00620   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00621   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00622 
00623   */
00624   return;
00625 }

00627 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00628   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - SET_REPORT
00629   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00630   * @retval None
00631   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00632 static void USBDClass_SetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00633 {
00634   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00635   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00636   switch (value)
00637   {
00638     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT:
00639     {
00640       if (pDev->Request.wIndex == 0)
00641       {
00642         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gOutputReportBuffer); // Buffer at least 4 bytes
00643         pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = USBDClass_SetReportCallBack0;
00644         pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara = len;
00645       }
00646       #if 0
00647       else if (pDev->Request.wIndex == 1)
00648       {
00649         pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gOutputReportBuffer1); // Buffer at least 4 bytes
00650         pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = USBDClass_SetReportCallBack1;
00651         pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara = len;
00652       }
00653       #endif
00654       else
00655       {
00656         break;
00657       }
00658       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00659       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00660       break;
00661     }
00662     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00663     {
00664       break;
00665     }
00666   }
00667 
00668   return;
00669 }
00670

00674   * @retval None
00675   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00676 static void USBDClass_SetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00677 {
00678   /* Add your own SET_IDLE function here....
00679      For example....
00680 
00681   u32 uReportID     = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00682   u32 uIdleDuration = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00683   u32 uInterface    = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00684 
00685   __IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID] = uIdleDuration;
00686 
00687   */
00688   return;
00689 }
00690

00742   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00743 static void USBDClass_Endpoint1(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00744 {
00745   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00746 
00747   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP1IN\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00748   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gInputReportBuffer, USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00749 
00750   return;
00751 }
